orientations.name: front_level
descriptions: Front camera level with the <object>
Front camera at same height as the <object> and perpendicular to the ground
instructions: Place the camera in front of and level with the <object>
Place the camera at the same height as the <object> and perpendicular to the ground

orientations.name: front_angled_down_45
descriptions: Front camera angled down 45 degrees
Front camera at 45 degree angle to the ground
Front camera tilted down
instructions: Place the camera in front of the <object> and angle it down 45 degrees
Place the camera at a 45 degree angle to the ground
Tilt the camera down

orientations.name: rear_level
descriptions: Rear camera level with the <object>
Rear camera at same height as the <object> and perpendicular to the ground
instructions: Place the camera behind and level with the <object>
Place the camera at the same height as the <object> and behind it

orientations.name: rear_angled_down_45
descriptions: Rear camera angled down 45 degrees
Camera behind and 45 degree angle down
Rear camera tilted down
instructions: Place the camera behind the <object> and angle it down 45 degrees
Place the camera at a 45 degree angle to the ground behind the <object>
Tilt the camera down a lot

orientations.name: left_level
descriptions: Camera on the left side and level with the <object>
Camera at same height as the <object> on the left side
instructions: Place the camera on the left side of <object>
Place the camera at the same height as the <object> and on the left side of it

orientations.name: left_angled_down_45
descriptions: Left camera angled down 45 degrees
Camera at 45 degree angle to the ground and 90 degrees to the left side
Camera tilted down and to the left of the subject
instructions: Place the camera 90 degrees to the left of the <object> and angle it down 45 degrees
Place the camera the left left of <object> and title it 45 degree angle to the ground
Tilt the camera down and look from the left

orientations.name: right_level
descriptions: Camera on the right side and level with the <object>
Camera at same height as the <object> on the right side
instructions: Place the camera on the right side of <object>
Place the camera at the same height as the <object> and on the right side of it

orientations.name: right_angled_down_45
descriptions: Right camera angled down 45 degrees
Camera at 45 degree angle to the ground and 90 degrees to the right side
Camera tilted down and to the right of the subject
instructions: Place the camera 90 degrees to the right of the <object> and angle it down 45 degrees
Place the camera the right right of <object> and title it 45 degree angle to the ground
Tilt the camera down and look from the right

framings.name: full
descriptions: Full view of the <object>
The <object> fills the frame
instructions: Frame the <object> so that it fills the frame

framings.name: close
descriptions: Close-up of the <object>
The <object> fills the frame
instructions: Frame the <object> so that it fills the frame

animations.name: pan_left
descriptions: The camera pans to the left
The camera moves left
instructions: Move the camera to the left
Pan the camera left

animations.name: orbit_left
descriptions: Orbit left
Move the camera around the <object> to the left
instructions: Move the camera around the <object> to the left

animations.name: pan_right
descriptions: The camera pans to the right
The camera moves right
instructions: Move the camera to the right
Pan the camera right

animations.name: orbit_right
descriptions: Orbit right
Move the camera around the <object> to the right
instructions: Move the camera around the <object> to the right

animations.name: zoom_in
descriptions: The camera zooms in
The camera moves closer to the <object>
instructions: Move the camera closer to the <object>
Zoom in

animations.name: zoom_out
descriptions: The camera zooms out
The camera moves away from the <object>
instructions: Move the camera away from the <object>
Zoom out
